item.title: Visualizing Neural Networks ğŸ‘ï¸ğŸ§
item.description: Neural networks are long assumed to be a black box, and though that might still be true to an extent, it can be very helpful to try to understand whatâ€™s going on inside it. In this blog post, Iâ€™ll try to crack open this black box and present some very intuitive ways to interpret neural nets. Knowing very surface-level linear algebra and neural network basics will make this post flow much easier.
